title: Double slit - slit spacing from 5th-order maxima

content.question: Monochromatic light of wavelength <math alttext="lambda" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>λ</mi></math> is incident upon a double slit. The figure shows the resulting interference pattern on a screen that is a distance <math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>L</mi></math> away from the slits, and the distance between the two indicated maxima is <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi></math>. What is the distance between the two slits?
